data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What was the last test that you had to study for, and how did you prepare? What resources did you use that were helpful? How can you use what you learned in the future?
data.answer: Four months ago, I decided to study English again in a training centre because I intend to continue my studies overseas next year. I chose to take IELTS exam because it is one of the most recognized English language proficiency tests in the world. I felt really rusty at first. I spent the first weeks brushing-up on my vocabulary. My mother tongue influences me a lot when it comes to pronunciation. I listened to audio-recordings, watch English TV shows, and try to imitate the sounds I hear. Now I can carry on basic conversations. English is the language of international communication. Knowing English will absolutely increase my chance of getting a good job in a multinational company in the future. (120 字)
